title: Day Trip to Ghent
content: Ghent is equally charming as Brussels with its medieval architecture and vibrant cultural scene. Discover Gravensteen Castle, a medieval fortress, and visit St. Bavo's Cathedral, home to the famous Ghent Altarpiece. Wander along the scenic canals and stop for coffee in one of Ghent's cozy cafes. Ghent's medieval charm and cultural richness provide a laid-back alternative to Brussels.
